creator: Theratrak
descriptionHtml:
Theratrak is a mobile app for occupational therapists to create customised therapy home programs for children.

If you are not an occupational therapist, or would like your therapist to sign up to use this product, email us at help@theratrak.co

Theratrak is a mobile app that allows occupational therapists to capture meaningful information from therapy sessions and create customised home programs for children.

Therapists have access to a database of therapeutic activity scaffolds which they can easily access within a therapy session. Therapists then attach photos and videos to create highly personal home programs, individual to each client’s needs. This allows the therapist to grade the activities to the child’s abilities and give specific verbal and written notes about task completion.

Therapists can use this tool concurrently with therapy sessions, helping to reduce the amount of lost paperwork or forgotten material.

Theratrak gives your patient digital access to the home program you prescribe, so that they continue with their treatment, better informed about their program, enabling them to take charge of their health.

Theratrak has partnered with Microsoft cloud storage to ensure enterprise-grade security. Your account is password protected, and available only to the therapist or the client.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: You can now upload your clinic's own media right into the clinic portal. We've really turned up the dial on customising your client's home programs. Specialised in a certain field or already have branded content (PDFs, Images, Videos)?... then make your clinic stand out! Attach your clinic’s media to relevant activities and each time they’re used by therapists in your clinic, the clinic content will automatically appear - saving even more time setting up home programs.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: To make the app better for you, we've added website links to the media features. This way you can connect more of your favourite games and resources to our platform. Keep an eye out for this months bonus activities, we hear they are some fun visual perception games.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've updated the app and the clinic portal so that you can now work as an allied health team with one client. Create and send home programs to your clients and alert them to whether it's an occupational therapy, speech therapy or physio program. Client's will get custom notifications depending on their therapist's program that is sent.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Theratrak’s had a facelift! We’ve updated the activities screen to make it more accessible, created a way for you to send strategies and set up routines for your participants. We’ve also upgraded the notifications centre, you can now send more meaningful nudges to keep everyone on track.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: It's time to get some more meaningful feedback from your participants! We've enhanced Theratrak's tracking capabilities so that you can track your participant's progress over time. Participants will be able to rate their Independence, assistance, performance and satisfaction with a task. Therapists will now have easy access to the upgraded clinic portal dashboard.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: You asked we listened, we’ve updated the app with some new features based on your feedback. You can now set each programs length, easily search for clients on the app and choose how often you want your participants to give you feedback. Happy trakking everyone!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Introducing Theratrak U! Here's an easy way to quickly learn about how to use Theratrak and support your therapists and participants to successfully use the app. For therapists check it out on your home screen and for participants, you can easily access it in the menu on the top right of your home screen.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You spoke, we listened, and now after many months of co-designing its Participant app, 3.0 is here.
Key things to look out for:
- Introducing Kelly, your first Theratmate
- Updated navigation from the home screen, quickly tick activities on the go and switch between therapies and accounts if you care for multiple people
- View therapy statistics in My Progress
- My journal records detailed feedback about therapy activities.
- Earn skills badges and be rewarded for engaging in therapy activities

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We’ve squashed some bugs and made some accessibility updates to the participant app.
We fixed a bug preventing participants from viewing pdfs and links.
We’ve added dark mode support for participants. This is our first step in making Theratrak more accessible for all of our participants. To try it out, switch the display mode on your device.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New features alert!
We've been busy updating the platform. Here are some of the new features:
- Today in therapy - build capacity and let your participants know what you did in the session.
- Active programs - see a live view of all of your programs from the app
- Turn on journal replies from the clinic portal.
- The clinic portal has also had a facelift. Check it out today.
As always, reach out if you have questions
Happy trakking everyone!

title:
Theratrak
4.0.0
